content: For centuries, astronomers believed that the Milky Way made up the entire universe. Hubble was among the first to show that the fuzzy patches in the sky seen through telescopes were other galaxies, not distant parts of the Milky Way.
translations: ita:Per secoli, gli astronomi credevano che la Via Lattea costituisse l'intero universo. Hubble fu tra i primi a dimostrare
